NAME: WEST CHANGRI NUP
REMARKS: Due to the lack of measurements in October 2011 where heavy snow falls had covered the stakes, 2010-11 and 2011-12 Ba was obtained from the 2010-12 mass balance (Ba(2010-12) = Ba(2010-11) + Ba(2011-12) = -2.68 m w.e; and applying a regression equation between the Changri Nup and Mera annual centered MBs between 2012 and 2015 (r2 = 0.97).
